news_feed.title: Safe Pesticide Application in Rice Farming
news_feed.content:
When applying pesticides, safety should be your top priority. Always wear protective gear including masks, gloves, and boots.

Timing is also crucial. The best time to spray is usually early morning or late afternoon when wind speeds are low to prevent drift to other crops.

news_feed.title: Understanding Chemical Resistance in Local Pests
news_feed.content:
Over-reliance on a single chemical group can lead to pests developing resistance. This means the pesticide no longer works effectively against them.

Rotate chemicals and monitor pest populations regularly.

news_feed.title: Sustainable Rice Farming Practices
news_feed.content:
Sustainable farming reduces environmental impact. Use organic fertilizers and integrated pest management.

This approach helps maintain soil health and biodiversity.

news_feed.title: Latest Innovations in Rice Pest Control
news_feed.content:
New biotech solutions offer targeted pest control without broad chemical use.

These innovations include genetically modified varieties resistant to pests.

news_feed.title: Weather Impacts on Rice Cultivation
news_feed.content:
Climate change affects rice yields. Monitor weather patterns and adapt irrigation.

Use drought-resistant varieties for better resilience.
